column5: Hi Anyone know where I could take the Family for the weekend and do a little tent camping? I live in Brantford and I went to Norfolk county last weekend to do a little scouting. While I was there I discovered that there are a lot of TICS. That is not something I need at this point because the wife doesnt want to go because of bugs, however I think I have her convinced. Anyhow maybe something within a couple of hrs from Brantford. Any Ideas?
We used to really like the Pinery way back when. Lots of stuff to do there now, trails to walk, even fishing in the river.  JF
Guelph Lake and Conostogo Lake  conservation areas are relatively nearby.

pinehurst. camping, swimming boat rentals, crappie, blue gill off the dock and LMB in the lillies. walking trails - and if the weather turns bad your 15 minutes from home. Also some of the sweetest corn around just outside Paris on the east side.
